name: Gakkou no Kaidan: Hyakuyoubako no Fuuin
storyline: The game has a Story Mode and a Minigame Mode. In the Story Mode, the player's objective is to exorcize the many ghosts at the old school building, very similar to other Gakkou no Kaidan games. There are monsters and ghosts found while walking through the school, and the player battles with them.
summary: Gakkou no Kaidan: Hyakuyoubako no Fuuin is an Adventure game, published by TDK Core, which was released in Japan in 2004.
